titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2419) to provide for the continuation of agricultural programs through fiscal year 2012, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2419) to provide for the continuation of agricultural programs through fiscal year 2012, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-261, by Mr. Cardoza.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Agriculture now printed in the bill, modified by the amendments printed in part A of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 92.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 574.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 202 (Roll no. 746).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2419 (Farm, Nutrition, and Bioenergy Act of 2007).
